showInfo.text: About to generate HTTPS dummy keystores. These should be used during evaluation and test and not for production systems.

runProgram.programArguments: -jar genservercert.jar "CN=SignServer Demo CA,SN=${caserialnumber}" "CN=${httphostname} O=SignServer Demo CA" /etc/signserver ${httpserverpassword} ${httptrustpassword} foo123

showInfo.text: About to start the JBoss Application Server. This will be done in the background and will be ready to process requests in about 1 minute.
Before uninstalling the SignServer must JBoss be stopped. This might take a few seconds.

stringParameter.name: signservernodeid
stringParameter.explanation: Enter an id of the node, this id must be a unique string for that node in a cluster (for example 'node1').

choiceParameter.description: Which type of database is going to be used?
choiceParameter.title: Database Selection
choiceParameter.name: databasetype

stringParameter.name: databasehosts
stringParameter.explanation: Enter the hostname of the backend database, if multiple hostnames use ',' as separator

stringParameter.name: databaseport
stringParameter.explanation: Enter the port of the backend database, (Standard is 3306 for Mysql, Mysql NDB Cluster, 5432 for Postgres and 1433 for MS SQL Server.

stringParameter.name: databasename
stringParameter.explanation: Enter the name of the backend database.

stringParameter.name: databaseuser
stringParameter.explanation: Enter the username used when connecting to the database.

passwordParameter.name: databasepwd
passwordParameter.explanation: Please provide a password for the database user

stringParameter.name: httphostname
stringParameter.explanation: Enter the DNS hostname of the cluster, (used in the SSL server certificate).

booleanParameter.name: usesyslog
booleanParameter.title: Use Syslog
booleanParameter.explanation: Do you want to send events to Syslog?

stringParameter.name: sysloghostname
stringParameter.explanation: Enter the hostname of the Syslog server.
